ğŸ‘»It's a golden-age of peace, and everyone is happy in this little cozy town of Westminster.

Alex was just an average boy until that one fateful night, then his whole life changed forever.

15 years ago a mysterious old man left a strange amulet to protect against great evil, but once Alex finds the amulet......his fate is sealed.

Alex transforms into a vampire by The Dark One (the Guardian of Darkness). He wants Alex to fulfill the prophecy and become The Chosen One...Â  Dracula, who will help the lost & abandoned souls move into the afterlife, for all of eternity.

Alex agrees to the magick contract and bonds with [The Dark One] as his Guardian Summon, but why!?Â  Play and find out.

ğŸ¦‡inspired by Chrono Trigger, Earthbound, and Breath of Fire.

Rediscover all the nostalgic charm today's RPGs are missing.

+Dialogue can't be skipped, you can't read behind signs, and all the clichÃ© 90s RPG mechanics

+Linear Storyline

+Explore towns freely to unlock new side-quests

+Cheesy events and dialogue

+Something is behind the waterfall (doesn't every classic RPG have one!?) (P.S. It's the Grim Reaper, spoiler alert!)

+In classic RPG tradition, the last boss will leave you shocked

The sequel to this game is Dracula all grown up:

Dracula: A Gothic RPG
